channel.title: My server
channel.description:
Hi, first off all i wanna thanks the ppl from here who helped me getting my server online:
now it looks like this: [img]http://img82.imageshack.us/img82/3838/server1sa1.jpg[/img]
But i wanna make the Menu bar like the new rs, and i want that people cant download my Client, and when they click runserver, a popup will show up Just like, JSR,Freak pkz,The void etc...
Greetz meric[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 10, 2009, 09:24:44 am[/size][hr]Pleas help?
